alert.note: Alert for Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Olmsted County through 500 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dover, or 15 miles east of Rochester, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and up to dime-sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eyota around 450 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Little Valley, Viola, County Roads 9 And 10 and Highway 42 And County 9. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 227 and 232. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
